task.title: Eclipse 3.4 - 4.2 Plugin Installation - The Zip Archive Method
task.shortdesc: The steps for installing the Eclipse plugin in Eclipse 3.4 - 4.2 with the Zip Archive method.

step.cmd: Download the zip archive with the plugin.
Unzip the downloaded zip archive in the dropins subdirectory of the Eclipse install directory.
Verify that is installed correctly by creating a new XML Project. Go to File New Other... and choose oXygen XML Editor oXygen XML Author oXygen XML Developer XML Project .
When prompted for a license key, enter the license information received in the registration email.
step.info: Note that if you already have a native version of installed on your computer, you will not be prompted for a license key for the Eclipse version. The existing license key will be used automatically.
